column5: Accelerate your professional career in commercial and corporate banking and the finance, insurance and investment industries. Learn how to apply financial theories to the real world with help from academic and industry experts.Study options are also available at our Glasgow campus or by distance learning.You are creative and confident, and committed to success in whatever you do.You know that international finance is dynamic, fast-moving, fast-changing. The MSc International Banking and Finance is designed for you.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 12-16 months full-time; 2-3 years part time and distance learning
